EmailTemplate.name: aaaExplore Year 7 evening repsonse
EmailTemplate.subject: Explore Year 7!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName}
We are looking forward to seeing you at our Explore Year 7 event on Tuesday 28 May, 2019!
Thank you for your booking! We are looking forward to seeing you at
Explore Year 7 on Tuesday 28 May.
Registration from 5.00pm
Keynote speakers from 5.30pm
Head of School, Dr Collier speaking at 6.00pm and 7.00pm
On the evening you will have the opportunity to:
Listen to keynote speakers and information sessions; Experience fun and interactive demonstrations and workshops; Speak with specialty staff and community representatives who will be available to answer your questions; and Enjoy entertainment and sausage sizzle on our famous Rooftop Playground.
You will receive further information, including an event program, prior to the evening.
We look forward to welcoming your family on the evening as you Explore Year 7!
Regards
Bruce Perry
Registrar/Mathematics Teacher
St Andrew's Cathedral School
Sydney Square, Sydney NSW 2000, Australia
direct 9286 9552 email RPedley@sacs.nsw.edu.au phone +61 2 9286 9500 fax +61 29286 9550
